import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent implements OnInit { name : string = ''; username : string = ''; password : string = ''; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } signup(){ console.log(this.name+" "+this.username+" "+this.password) } }
